plain: Based on the user's favourite books, it can be inferred that their favourite genre is probably literary fiction, their favourite plot is probably character-driven, their favourite setting is probably contemporary, their favourite writing style is probably introspective and lyrical, their favourite length is probably novella-length, their favourite topic is probably existentialism and spirituality, their favourite pacing is probably slow and contemplative, their favourite narrative structure is probably first-person, and their favourite themes are probably identity, faith, and social justice.
